perturbation.original_text:
Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, as of the Distribution Date, Nuance hereby grants to SpinCo and the
members of the SpinCo Group a worldwide, non-exclusive, fully paid-up, perpetual and irrevocable, transferable (subject to ARTICLE VIII), sublicensable
(subject to Section 3.01(g)) license under the Nuance Patents, solely to the extent that claims of the Nuance Patents cover products or services of the
SpinCo Business in the SpinCo Field of Use, together with natural extensions and evolutions thereof, in each case to make, have made, use, sell, offer for
sale, import and otherwise exploit such products and services, together with natural extensions and evolutions thereof.
perturbation.changed_text:
Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, as of the Distribution Date, Nuance hereby grants to SpinCo and the
members of the SpinCo Group a worldwide, non-exclusive, fully paid-up license under the Nuance Patents, solely to the extent that claims of the Nuance Patents cover products or services of the
SpinCo Business in the SpinCo Field of Use, together with natural extensions and evolutions thereof, in each case to make, have made, use, sell, offer for
sale, import and otherwise exploit such products and services, together with natural extensions and evolutions thereof. This license is granted for an initial term of five (5) years, subject to renewal at Nuance's sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'perpetual and irrevocable' and adding a limited term with renewal at Nuance's discretion, the modified text directly contradicts the original grant of a perpetual and irrevocable license, creating uncertainty about the duration of the license.  This could lead to disputes about SpinCo's rights to use the Nuance Patents after the initial term.

perturbation.original_text:
Each Party agrees that it shall comply with all applicable national and international laws and regulations
relating to import and/or export control in its country(ies), if any, involving any commodities, software, services or technology within the scope of this
Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
Each Party agrees that it shall comply with all applicable national and international laws and regulations
relating to import and/or export control in its country(ies), if any, involving any commodities, software, services or technology within the scope of this
Agreement. However, should compliance with such laws and regulations prove unduly burdensome, the parties may mutually agree to waive certain requirements on a case-by-case basis.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates compliance with all import/export laws. The addition of a clause allowing mutual agreement to waive requirements introduces a contradiction. It becomes unclear whether strict compliance is always required, or if exceptions can be made, creating potential legal ambiguity.
